comments.content: dei.... english la translate panrathukku vera entha padamum illiya?

comments.author: vignesh
comments.content: dei,some tamil titles are ridiculous.granted.some are not that bad.2012-rudhram is well thought out actually.just the number 2012 wud be meaningless in tn.in english there were enough marketing for everyone to know that it was abt apocalypse.and fyi, 'kattalai' also means a club or community in tamil. i particularly liked one tamil title u missed. for 'deep blue sea' it is ' nadu kadal thigil' ...but all said, no excuses for '300 paruthi veerargal','ukkiran',sooravali' ...... :)

comments.author: Suji
comments.content: Answering your question on tamil name for orange: cousin saathukodi name okay va? After a long time refreshing post :) Good job. Chinese to Tamil dubbing vida English to englipish was hilarious!

comments.author: Pradep
comments.content: Dei antha karumatha transalate llam panla da . Thalaivar Jithan Ramesh pesara dialogue adhu . Nee thappa nenachikkadha :D .

comments.content: Dei ithukke ippadi nna namma thalaivar videova paaru . http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wzFk7H9ak8Y

comments.author: Pradep
comments.content: Ya Ya . Rudhram means 'Wrath Of God' . Its a perfect name for the movie . But the way they say it in the trailer and all . Too funny . You have to accept. Kattalai means Club ? Thats news to me . And 'nadu kadal thigil' is nice . I kinda deliberately left out good names like 'Carribean Kallarai Theevu' 'Paadhaala Ulagam' and all . :D

comments.content: Saathukkudi llam sellathu . Sweet Lime , Mosambi nnellam athukku per irukku . :)

comments.author: Srivatsan
comments.content: Ruthram font nalla illa! but tamil dubbing was perfect. the main pluspoint is they left the song in english( sung by protagonist in car enroute to yellowstone) instead of substituting with tamil song.only place where they misinterpreted was the tibet monk speaking with that lad. regarding the post,singam kalam erangiduchchu! expecting more posts! :)

comments.author: Vagappeno
comments.content: Hey guys, My name is William and I am from Stirling in the United Kingdom. I have freshly discovered this forum and I like it very much. I am a bit shy so I will not talk much about myself but maybe when I will get more confortable, you will get to know me better! My main hobbies are playing chess and watching movies. I also love outdoor activites but the temperature has been terrible for the last days or so here in Stirling. I was wondering if anyone else here is from the united Kingdom too? I am glad to have joined this forum! Have a nice day! :) William PS: Sorry if this was posted in the wrong section. I could not find the right one!
